content.body: **Call for reviewers for the [ESM Source Phase proposal](https://github.com/tc39/proposal-esm-phase-imports/issues/26)** - as we did not yet confirm the list at plenary, we would like to try and confirm our reviewers before the next meeting. Please respond here or DM me to be added to the reviewers list for the proposal.

content.body: if it's supposed to be adjacent to the hackathon, why are none of the dates adjacent to the dates of the hackathon?
it's adjacent to the web engines hackfest (https://webengineshackfest.org/) (website not yet updated for 2025)
it's not strictly adjacent because of the weekend
but option 2 (28th to 30th May) is the closest with just the weekend between the two
